hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:The Prophet (ﷺ) forbade that a woman should be married to a man along with her paternal aunt or with her maternal aunt (at the same time). Az-Zuhri (the sub-narrator) said: There is a similar order for the paternal aunt of the father of one's wife, for 'Urwa told me that `Aisha said, "What is unlawful because of blood relations, is also unlawful because of the corresponding foster suckling relations

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُنْكَحُ الْمَرْأَةُ عَلَى عَمَّتِهَا
chapter.eng-name: A woman should not marry a man already married to her paternal aunt
